steps.name: User launch Pizzahut application with "https://www.pizzahut.co.in/"
User wait for auto location black pop up screen
User close the pop up screen
User see pop up for delivery asking for enter location
User type address as "lulu mall banglore"
User select first auto populate drop down option
User navigate to deails page
User validate vegetarian radio button flag is off
User clicks on Pizzas menu bar option
User select add button of any pizza from Recommended
User see that the pizza is getting added under Your Basket
User validate pizza price plus Tax is checkout price
User validate checkout button contains Item count
User validate checkout button contains total price count
User clicks on Drinks option
User select Pepsi option to add into the Basket
User see 2 items are showing under checkout button
User see total price is now more than before
User remove the Pizza item from Basket
see Price tag got removed from the checkout button
User see 1 item showing in checkout button
User Clicks on Checkout button
User see minimum order required pop up is getting displayed
